argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | op0le.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | op0le.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | op0le.z | |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( glb ` K ) = ( glb ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> K e. OP ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lub ` K ) = ( lub ` K ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 4 | #P_op01dm | |- ( K e. OP -> ( B e. dom ( lub ` K ) /\ B e. dom ( glb ` K ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simprd | |- ( K e. OP -> B e. dom ( glb ` K ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> B e. dom ( glb ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 4, 2, 3, 5, 6, 10 | #P_p0le | |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> .0. .<_ X ) |
